title: Limitations on loans and extensions of credit to one
context: ยง412:7-303 Limitations on loans and extensions of credit to one borrower. A savings and loan association shall comply with the lending limitations with respect to one borrower contained in section 5u of the Home Owners&rsquo; Loan Act of 1933, as amended, 12 U.S.C. ยง1464u.
